snippet.title: Puzzling Places - Launch Trailer (Quest)
snippet.description:
Download for Oculus Quest / Quest 2 - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3931148300302917/

Puzzling Places brings relaxing and wholesome 3D jigsaw puzzling to VR.

Put together hyper-realistic miniatures of beautiful places from around the globe. Enter the meditative flow of puzzling and enjoy each place coming alive with their unique & immersive soundscapes as you complete them.

Puzzling Places is a modern take on an age-old pastime that’s fun for the whole family thanks to its simple gameplay and easy controls. Play seated, standing, or at full roomscale!

The game features 16 unique puzzles created from detailed photogrammetry 3D scans of real locations. Each puzzle is available in 25, 50, 100, 200 & 400 pieces!

Discord - https://discord.gg/Ccas6uVPFS
Twitter - https://twitter.com/PuzzlingPlaces
Instagram - https://instagram.com/puzzlingplaces
Facebook - https://facebook.com/puzzlingplaces
Oculus - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3931148300302917/
